abstract: Two lesser-known deputies of Jon S. Corzine have found themselves at the center of the maelstrom at MF Global, which filed for bankruptcy on Monday.
snippet: Two lesser-known deputies of Jon S. Corzine have found themselves at the center of the maelstrom at MF Global, which filed for bankruptcy on Monday.
lead_paragraph: As MF Global filed for bankruptcy on Monday, much of the attention has focused on the Wall Street firm's chief executive, Jon S. Corzine, the former New Jersey governor and onetime head of Goldman Sachs.

headline.main: At MF Global, Two Other Falling Stars
